snippet: Not everyone is cut out to be a supervisor, the author writes. When offered a management position, make sure that you really want it.
abstract: Preoccupations column by executive coach and corporate trainer Peggy Klaus contends that not everyone is cut out to be a supervisor; advises employees that when offered a management position, they should make sure they really want it.
lead_paragraph: Not everyone is cut out to be a supervisor, the author writes. When offered a management position, make sure that you really want it.

headline.seo: Maybe a Management Job Isn’t Your Style
